parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of names of all unit's stored items, including [[weapons]] but excluding [[magazines]] (see [[itemsWithMagazines]]) and [[assignedItems]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[items]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_itemsPlayer <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[items]] [[player]]; </code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[sideChat]] [[format]] ["%1", [[items]] [[player]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[itemsWithMagazines]], [[assignedItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
